messages.title: Paul Says...
messages.content:
“We do not inherit the Earth from our ancestors. We borrow it from our children.”
I am standing up for living within the ecological limits of our planet and living with compassion for others.
We will nurture the environment by creating jobs in renewable energy and conservation to avert pollution and dangerous climate change.
We will have access to safe, clean, affordable public rail and bus transport plus a walking and cycling revolution.
Every young person will be able to fulfil their dreams through access to free higher education or apprenticeships.

messages.title: This election isn’t about the next 5 years. It’s about the next 50 years.
messages.content:
Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.
Every Green vote on 8th June will help make that vision a reality.
To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.
If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it’s in your hands. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters.
Vote Paul de Hoest on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nurturing the environment by creating jobs in renewable energy and conservation to avert pollution and dangerous climate change.
Access to safe, clean, affordable public rail and bus transport plus a walking and cycling revolution.
Every young person to be able to fulfil their dreams through access to free higher education or apprenticeships.
Shaping an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment, building affordable homes, and providing properly funded public services.
Putting power back in citizens' hands through citizen’s democracy.

images.caption: Paul de Hoest standing in front of flowers

leaflet.additionalNotes: Paul and his wife have lived in South West Hertfordshire for 21 years raising 3 children in local state schools. With a career in the finance and public sectors he is a regular commuter into the City.
